Message:
and I know that this world
sees me as a nuisance.

Which is why I chose
to stay in the ruins.

There’s probably nowhere
else that would accept
me anyway.

Just as those thoughts
ran through my mind,
I noticed the silhoutte of
a corpse in an abandoned
building.

...Ahh, one of the creatures
must’ve killed you when
you were leaving town, huh?

My apprentice...
and now you...
You’re all so unlucky.
